Package simpleGUI.base

package simpleGUI.base

  • Class
    Description
    ActionButton
    A button that can be added to a Frame, with the desired action.
    BreadCrumbs
    Bread crumbs that can be attached to a NavigationBar.
    Frame
    Hold the non-window-specific elements that can be displayed in the GUI.
    FrameHandler
    Handle the frames attached to a window.
    FrameLocationHandler
    Handle the location of a Frame on the attached window.
    Label
    Label that can be attached and displayed on a Frame.
    NavigationBar
    Hold navigation elements that will be placed on its attached window.
    NavigationBarLocationHandler
    Handle the location of a NavigationBar its attached window.
    NavigationButton
    A button that is used to navigate between different windows.
    Scrollbar
    Scrollbar that can be attached to a window.
    Scrollbar.ScrollbarDirection
    The possible scroll directions of the Scrollbar.
    Scrollbar.ScrollbarLocation
    The possible locations of the Scrollbar on a window.
    ScrollbarDirectionHandler
    Handle the scroll direction to a Scrollbar.
    ScrollbarLocationHandler
    Handle the location of the scrollbar on its window.
    TextBox
    A text box module that can be attached to a Frame.
    Window
    Functions as a root when building the GUI.
